                                    </div>

                            </div>

                            <!-- 评论内容 -->

<!-- 删除评论的二次确认弹窗 -->
<div class="del-comment-confirm-container" id="delCommentConfirm">
    <div class="del-comment-confirm-mask"></div>
    <div class="del-comment-confirm">
        <div class="del-comment-confirm-title">提示信息</div>
        <p class="del-comment-confirm-content"></p>
        <div class="del-comment-confirm-group">
            <div class="del-comment-btn-cancel">取消</div>
            <div class="del-comment-btn-confirm">确认</div>
        </div>
        <div class="del-comment-confirm-close">
            <div class="del-comment-confirm-close-body icon-times-o"></div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    <i id="popClose" class="pop-close icon-times-o-thin">
        <!--[if lt IE 8]>x<![endif]--></i>

<div class="aside-right" id="feed-side">
    <!--顶部  爆料  share模块 -->
    <div class="baoliao-box">
    <p class="txt">
        爆料是一件简单又好玩的事，动动手指就能把你认可的好价商品分享给千万值友，还能获得大量金币奖励，兑换礼品卡和值得买定制礼品！赶快行动起来吧！
        <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="J_check_video">点击观看视频吧~</a>
        <i class="J_check_video icon-video-o-thin"></i>
    </p>
        <div class="video">
        </div>
        <a href="https://www.smzdm.com/baoliao/" target="_blank" class="btn-go" onclick="dataLayer.push({'event':'1210013','name':'右侧爆料模块'})">我要爆料</a>
    <div class="rookie-award-container">
        <div class="J_rookie_award rookie-award">
            <span>爆料新人可获额外奖励</span>
            <i class="icon icon-info-mark-o-thin"></i>
            <div class="rookie-award-desc">
                <h5>新人奖励</h5>
